title: Reduce Car Commute
description: Challenge yourself to carpool, bike, or use public transportation instead of driving alone.

title: Energy Conservation
description: Turn off lights when not in use, unplug devices, and switch to energy-efficient appliances.

title: Reusable Containers
description: Use reusable containers for your lunch and snacks to reduce single-use plastic waste.

title: Shorter Showers
description: Limit your shower time to save water and reduce energy consumption.
